scripts.dev:server: cd packages/ai-api && uv run uvicorn ai_api.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.dev:queue: cd packages/ai-api && uv run python -m ai_api.scripts.run_stream_worker
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd packages/ai-api && uv sync
scripts.lint: eslint packages/whatsapp-client/src && pnpm --filter finance-dashboard lint && cd packages/ai-api && uv run ruff check .
scripts.lint:fix: eslint packages/whatsapp-client/src --fix && cd packages/ai-api && uv run ruff check . --fix
scripts.format: prettier --write 'packages/whatsapp-client/src/**/*.{ts,tsx}' 'packages/finance-dashboard/src/**/*.{ts,tsx}' && cd packages/ai-api && uv run ruff format .
scripts.format:check: prettier --check 'packages/whatsapp-client/src/**/*.{ts,tsx}' 'packages/finance-dashboard/src/**/*.{ts,tsx}' && cd packages/ai-api && uv run ruff format . --check
